:::config { "language": "bash" }
cat filesss.txt | xargs -P 2 -I % http -f POST httpbin.org/post filename="%" token="secret" --ignore-stdin
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-bash nord' style='background-color: #2e3440;color: #d8dee9;'><code data-theme='nord' data-lang='bash' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #88c0d099'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #4c566a;
